entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text:
Andrew Cuomo allowed nurses infected by the coronavirus to work in nursing homes.

Elderly patients died as a result.

Cuomo is completely incompetent and people are dead today because of him.

He should be fired.

https://t.co/eA3SxxvW6y
